name: Color Match Tap
description:
Color Match Tap is very crazy color puzzle game. Color Match Tap is very addictive simple game for short game lovers. In this game you just need to stay focused and tap at right indicating color. Colour wheel is rotating clock wise and counter clock wise to puzzle you. Just stay focused and concentrate on the changing color.
Tap on screen in time to match the color otherwise your game is over. Tap tap just tap at right time to get more n more score.
